name: Lancaster Espionage
description:
The year is 18XX. Your mission is to retrieve the plans to machines that could catapult your nations production capability into the future! The industrial Loom! Pick up the blueprint once you locate them, and escape without being caught!

Controls:
WASD - Move
E - Interact
C (Toggle) - Crouch
Shift - Sprint

Credits:

BryanO - Programmer
Veshyn - 2D/3D Art
Lean56 -Audio/Composer/Music
tomatosarefun - 3D Art / Level Design
